input.name: btnText
input.label: Text
input.help-text: Set a button text. Fallback value is "Click here"

input.name: btnColor
input.label: Background color
input.help-text: Use a hexadecimal color value for the background of the button (example: "#4286f4"), or a valid color name (example: "red" or "white"). The default color, if nothing here is set, is a green one.

option-set.name: url
option-set.label: Link
option-set.help-text: Please select the type of link you wish to create. The first option is used for linking outside of your site, while the second one is for internal links.

option.name: text
option.label: External URL
option.help-text: Add an URL to an external source. The URL should begin with "https" or "http". For example https://example.com. You can only use either "External URL" or "Link to a page". In case you fill both fields, "Link to a page" has priority.

option.name: content
option.label: Link to another content
option.help-text: Select a page that you have already made and want the button to point to. You can only use either "External URL" or "Link to a page". In case you fill both fields, "Link to a page" has priority.
